name: Cheers the Village Pub
text:
Sandwiches
The Farmer's Choice Steak Sandwich

Description: Served open-faced on garlic toasted focaccia bread, AAA free-range grass-fed 8oz New York strip marinated in a garlic, ginger, and dry mustard marinade cooked how you want it, topped with a garlic sautéed medley of crimini mushrooms, red and yellow peppers, served with the side of your choice.

Price: $15.00

Cheer's Blackened Chicken Club

Description: A fire-blackened chicken breast topped with a slice of provolone, roasted red peppers, lettuce, tomato, and chipotle mayo on a toasted ciabatta bun.

Price: $12.00

Note: Organic chicken usually (in stock; ask server)

Additional Note: All sandwiches listed: Sides include loaded mashed potatoes, loaded potato skins, sweet potato, onion rings or a side Caesar salad or for an extra $2.50 for a side toasted almond (house salad).

Burgers
Cheer's Beef or Bison Burger

Description: Grilled to perfection topped with smoked gouda or jalapeno gouda cheese (your choice), peppered bacon, garlic sautéed crimini mushrooms, crispy cajun onions and chipotle mayo with your choice of sides.

Price: $12.00 / $15.00 for Bison

Garlic Roasted Red Pepper Chevre Burger

Description: Grilled to perfection topped with a slice of prosciutto, garlic roasted red peppers and chevre goat cheese.

Price: $12.00 / $15.00 for Bison

Cheer's Cheese Burger or Hamburger

Description: Grilled to perfection with or without cheese, smoked gouda or jalapeno gouda cheese.

Price: Not listed

Appetizers and Snacks
Pita Chip Nachos: $13.00

Crisp pita chips layered with a three cheese mixture, prosciutto, balsamic reduction, diced tomatoes, pesto, red and yellow peppers, finished with balsamic glaze and green onion.

Twice Baked Loaded Potato Skins: $9.00

Potato skins stuffed with a garlic mashed potato mix, bacon, tomato, mixed with a three cheese blend, oven baked to perfection and finished with fresh green onions.

Ultimate Stuffed Mushrooms: $9.00

Garlic sautéed crimini mushrooms caps stuffed with goat cheese and smoked with a roasted red pepper mix then wrapped in prosciutto and baked to perfection.

Steak Cut Onion Rings: $6.00

Thick cut onion rings deep fried to a golden brown served with chipotle mayo for dipping.

Panko Breaded Pickerel Fingers: $9.00

Fresh panko breaded pickerel fried to a golden brown and tossed in a light cajun spice. Served with a creamy dill dipping sauce and fresh lemon wedges.

Garlic Pizza Bread: $10.95

Two pieces of toasted ciabatta buns topped with roasted fresh mozzarella, pepperoni, caramelized onions, green pepper, and romano cheese baked to perfection.

Cheer's Feta Bruschetta: $9.95

Garlic toasted focaccia bread topped with diced tomato, green pepper, and red onion, mixed with a garlic basil oil baked with fresh feta cheese.

Salads
Garlic Chicken Caesar

Description: Crisp romaine lettuce, bacon bits, poached pears, tossed in a creamy caesar dressing topped with seasoned grilled chicken, shredded pecans and served with a fresh lemon wedge.

Price: $12.50

Chef's Toasted Almond Steak Salad

Description: Spring mixed lettuce, halved cherry tomato, red onion, toasted shaved almonds covered in a garlic maple vinaigrette topped with an 8oz AAA farm fresh grilled, dry marinated and grass marinated New York strip and cherry tomatoes.

Price: $16.00

Chef's Toasted Almond Tossed

Description: Romaine or spring mix lettuce topped with tomato, cucumber, red onion, toasted almonds and goat cheese with your choice of dressing.

Price: $11.00

Pasta and Fish
Linguine Chicken or Veg Alfredo

Description: (A different take on a classic) Broccoli, cauliflower, red and yellow peppers, snow peas, blackened chicken, sweet basil and garlic sautéed to perfection then added to a real cream alfredo sauce reduction topped with a fresh blend of parmesan and asiago garnished served with garlic toasted focaccia. (Vegetable alfredo usually as much veg.)

Price: $14.50 (Chicken)

Price: $12.50 (Vegetable with more added veg)
